params._pool: The address of the Uniswap pool the pair manager will be based of

returns._pairManager: The address of the just-created pair manager

params._governance: The address being proposed as the new governance

params._pool: The address of the Uniswap pool

pairManagers.return: _pairManager The address of the corresponding pair manager

returns._0: _pairManager The address of the corresponding pair manager

AlreadyInitialized().notice: Throws an error if the pair manager is already initialized

NoGovernanceZeroAddress().notice: Throws if trying to set governance to zero address

OnlyGovernance().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not governance

OnlyOwner().notice: Throws an error if the caller is not the owner

OnlyPendingGovernance().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not pendingGovernance

GovernanceProposal(address).notice: Emitted when a new governance is proposed

GovernanceSet(address).notice: Emitted when pendingGovernance accepts to be governance

PairCreated(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new pair manager is created

acceptGovernance().notice: Changes the governance from the current governance to the previously proposed address

createPairManager(address).notice: Creates a new pair manager based on the address of a Uniswap pool         For example, the uniswap address of DAI-WETH, will create the Keep3r/DAI-WETH pool

pairManagers(address).notice: Maps the address of a Uniswap pool, to the address of the corresponding PairManager         For example, the uniswap address of DAI-WETH, will return the Keep3r/DAI-WETH pair manager address

setGovernance(address).notice: Proposes a new address to be governance

userdoc.notice: This contract creates new pair managers
